sections.heading: Operational Snapshot
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **HIAL recognised for Health & Safety Promotion work** — Highlands and Islands Airports Ltd have been awarded Highly Commended in the Small Airport Category for their work for 2025 Airports UK Health & Safety Week.
- **Dundee Airport Feature in Airport Operator Magazine** — The latest edition of Airport Operator, the magazine published by Airports UK includes a feature on Dundee Airport.
- **Complete our survey for a chance to win** — Highlands & Islands Airports Ltd (HIAL) is asking passengers who use any of its 11 airports to complete an online survey. Entrants will have the option to be entered into a draw for Loganair flights.
